data.enText: a plant that grows in the sea or ocean, or on rocks at the edge of the sea or ocean. There are many different types of seaweed , some of which are eaten as food.

tr: plant growing in the sea, especially marine algae

value.def: Seaweed is a plant that grows in the sea. There are many kinds of seaweed.

trans: 紫菜汤；紫菜湯；海藻汤；海带汤；紫菜蛋花汤
